body.name: CZUR Halo X Pro Dual Webcam for PC, 1080P Web Camera with Microphone, USB Camera for Computer, 90° View, Plug & Play, Compatible with Windows (Not for Mac), for Skype/TikTok/YouTube/Yahoo Messenger
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🎥【1080P Webcam】The main camera captures clear video and images at 1080P(1920x1080)@60fps (secondary camera at 1080P(1920x1080)@30fps). This is a computer webcam designed for video calling, recording, conferencing, gaming, livestreaming. Note: The Newest Halo has been upgraded to 30FPS/60FPS. Maintainence：Output may get blurred. Use optical-lens-wipe to clean fingerprints and grease off lens
🎥【Plug and Play】Connected by USB, NO driver installation needed, simply plug the USB into your computer, then you are good to make video calls, conferences,online teaching, etc

🎥【Dual Camera】Halo has two cameras that can work separately and pointing at different directions, 90° field of view (FOV), the top camera can be rotated manually 270 degrees horizontally, and the base can be rotated manually 180 degrees horizontally to meet your wide-angle viewing needs
🎥【Note】Some softwares may NOT be able to use 2 cameras simultaneously, download CZUR's software "CZUR Camera" instead

🎥【Wide Compatibility】The webcam is compatible with Win7/Win8/Win10, 𝗡𝗼𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗠𝗮𝗰. Halo X Pro can be used with most mainstream video conferencing softwares (such as Zoom, Skype, FaceTime, OBS, Hangouts, Twitch, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Xbox One, GoReact, etc)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 23 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why doesn't the image look like 1080P ? Some software may compress video causing low video quality. Example, for ZOOM users,go to setting--video setting--"Enable HD". Do I have to download the CZUR software? No, CZUR software is NOT mandatory.Most softwares are compatible with Halo. Does Halo work with my computer? Halo can work with Win7/Win8/Win10, 32-bit or 64-bit; Note: Not compatible with macOS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam with cool features.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the CZUR Halo X Pro Dual Webcam to use for streaming and online classes. I was very impressed by the quality and performance of this webcam. It has two cameras that can work separately and point in different directions, which is something I haven't seen in a webcam before. It is very easy to set up and use, as it does not require any driver installation or app. It just plugs into my PC's USB port and works. The video resolution is 1080p, which is clear and sharp. The microphone is also decent and picks up my voice well. The webcam also has some cool features including picture-in-picture. The webcam also comes with a long USB cable that gives me more flexibility in positioning it. The design of the webcam is sleek and compact, and it does not take up much space on my desk. It also has a privacy cover, which is handy and gives me extra peace of mind. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product and I would recommend it to anyone who needs a webcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great versatile webcam.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried 4 other webcams and this is by far the best one of tried. My biggest issue I have a fluorescent light above my desk and it bleaches out the camera view. The halo camera allows you to adjust everything making the picture perfect. It is all around a great camera. The Device is sleek and often noticeable on your desk. Super easy to install and it gave such a clear, strong and wide-angle picture without me having to adjust my laptop constantly. For staff without cameras built into their computers, this was a game-changer. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works just as I hoped.
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this camera as a secondary webcam and we quickly realized it could replace our primary camera. Plug-and-play convenience and excellent image quality give you plenty of flexible options to get you the angle you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but Unusual Webcam Format
reviews.reviewText: I used this device for an International conference with Zoom and the image was great. It was much better than most of the other 67 participant’s images.It took a while to set up, but eventually my previous experience won out. The instructions are limited. (I do not find video setup presentations to be worthwhile.)My biggest issue was the mistaken assumption that it would work with macOS. This is still unclear, since virtually every current webcam is supported on macOS.After a mad scramble to find a Windows laptop at the last minute, the setup was successful.I recommend this item for you if you are using only Windows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool addition to my WFH desk
reviews.reviewText: This dual webcam is great for setting up two different settings for your video meetings. I like to keep toggling depending if I am standing or sitting. Both works good and easy switching. The quality for both cams is consistent. It also looks sleek and clean. I liked the way it kinda blended with my monitors and keyboard. I would surely recommend anyone looking to add better camera for their home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth buying.
reviews.reviewText: Poor quality and difficult to attach on, very impractical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I had very limited space for a webcam,this thing is thin& tall, worked perfectly, good quality
reviews.reviewText: The sound and picture quality was amazingly good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb, I'm very happy with it!
reviews.reviewText: It is sleek and sits very prominently on the desktop. Installation was very easy and it provides a clear, crisp, wide-angle image without me having to constantly adjust my laptop. For employees who don't have a built-in webcam in their computers, this is money well spent. Highly recommended.
